panels.title: Coordinator - Dremio Memory JVM Direct Current
Executor - Dremio Memory JVM Direct Current

targets.expr:
label_join(
 sum by(node, host_ip, pod, pod_ip) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", created_by_kind="StatefulSet"}),
 "instance",":9100","host_ip", "doesmotexist")

sort_desc(1 -
  (
   max without (mountpoint, fstype) (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="node-exporter", fstype!=""})
   /
   max without (mountpoint, fstype) (node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="node-exporter", fstype!=""})
  ) != 0
)
